name: .QB2006 File Extension
summary: Learn about .QB2006 files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Accounting data file created by the Mac version of QuickBooks, a small business accounting program; contains company financial management information, such as income and expenses; used for tracking financial data, as well as filing taxes.

content: Mac versions of QuickBooks use the software year as part of the file extension. For example, the QuickBooks 2009 extension is .QB2009.
NOTE: QB2006 files were used for a previous tax year, so they are now considered legacy.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
